doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Shah Alam
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Shah Alam is a Urologist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), MS (Urology), CCD (BIRDEM). He is a Assistant Professor, Urology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Shah Alam at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 4pm to 7pm (Closed: Thu & Friday).
